comments.text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; rv:7.0.1) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/7.0.1
Build ID: 20110928134238

Steps to reproduce:

When I go on multiple sites entering information into text fields, then go back to a site to put in my username/password


Actual results:

the username field is cluttered with previous entries


Expected results:

display only the saved usernames on that particular site
